SUSTAINABILITY

Corporate Social Responsibility

We are oblivious of our deliberate contributions to the community of the communities where we operate. So we will continuously ensure that these communities feel the impact of our existence positively and progressively. Through the Local Content Policy, we will collaborate with the local communities, state and national institutions to develop infrastructures and support interventions in healthcare, sports, and education. In partnership with community leaders, we will continuously monitor and identify socio-economic needs in communities that we can meet to drive development for our host communities.

Our HSE Policy

At Trust Energy Group, IT’S SAFETY FIRST, and we are fully committed to maintaining a safe working environment for our employees, the community, clients, suppliers, visitors, and other stakeholders. At all our offices and site bases, we adhere to the international standard of safety regulations which ensure an accident-free working environment and maintain the health and security of our employees, the host communities, vendors/suppliers, clients, and visitors. We are fully an environmentally conscious entity and this reflects in our policy. We operate in compliance with all relevant and applicable environmental legislation, standards, and requirements that promote the integrity of environmental policies.

Health & Safety

We provide a safe working environment that poses no risks to the health and safety of our employees, the community, clients, suppliers, visitors, and stakeholders in full compliance with the local laws, customs, cultures, and applicable legislation.

The Environment

It is in our policy to ensure that our processes, equipment, and working environments in all facilities are following the highest standards applicable, to ensure that the integrity of the environment is maintained and hazards-free at all times.

Security

We consider effective security as a major business enabler. We regularly check and identify exposure to security risks, analyze, and implement safety controls to protect our personnel, the community, clients, suppliers, visitors, and shareholders at all times.

Community Relations

Trust Energy Group remains committed to consciously balancing its business needs with the needs of the communities within which we operate.

Drug & Alcohol

We understand the dangers alcohol/drug abuse poses to the workplace, so we have put in place structures and processes that regularly help us to examine employees’ fitness to work, based on these parameters.
